snippet.description: pin This talk was presented at an official TED conference, and was featured by our editors on the home page.

snippet.title: MOOC | TED Blog
snippet.description: Anant Agarwal runs EdX.org, the Harvard-MIT open-education site, and he's here to talk MOOCs, those "massively open online courses" that have generated both excitement and skepticism throughout the chattering world of the digital classes.

snippet.title: Daphne Koller's TED Talk: What's new about MOOCs ...
snippet.description: Daphne Koller of Coursera has a TED talk that was just posted this month (linked here and below) that I highly recommend. Daphne does a good job of explaining the rationale for Coursera, and offers several example snippets from existing courses (including a couple from Nick Parlante's ...

snippet.title: 10 TED Talks Perfect For the eLearning Industry...
snippet.description: From the perspective of someone who already taught MOOC, he mentioned about the fact that (at least in his class) the students are self-selecting already due to the circumstance of the MOOC offers, which should have higher success rate, but not so.

snippet.title: [PPS] MOOC \- Blinn College
snippet.description: Coursera has offered the most, around 325 by March of this year. September mooc.org launched as an open source platform for others to use on their own Why are MOOCs Offered? Daphne Koller, Stanford prof behind Coursera, gave a much-viewed TED talk.

snippet.title: TED Talks
snippet.description: Technology - Entertainment - Design TED talks are a wonderful source of out-of-the box thinking, information and inspiratiion. These are just a few of my favorites, dealing with the present and future of education. T

snippet.title: Transforming Grounds: The End of Ted Talks and MOOCs
snippet.description: During the last year or two, I have seen more and more signs of a growing dislike for the TED talks. There are articles, blogposts, and comics that in different ways display one or another aspect of TED talks that people seem to see as problematic.
